location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 8041/47 'Employment of Lt Col Sir B Bromhead'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file mainly consists of a telegram from the Government of Pakistan, External Affairs, to the Secretary of State for Commonwealth Relations, regarding the employment of Lieutenant-Colonel B Bromhead, and the suitable vacancies that are available.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for Commonwealth Relations
